segments.text: Hi , John . What brings you to town ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Mary . Lily wanted me to buy her some things for the party .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think of the traffic today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . You can say that again . It ’ s noisy too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad I did not drive a car .
segments.speaker: S2
